page.title: 05The new school.
page.content: From 1968, the village began to grow, and a lot of new estates were built. The numbers in the school grew every year. Four temporary classrooms were built, but in 1982 it was decided to build a new school at the back of the old building. A new playground was made, and a large hall and kitchen were built on the old playground. On the original school field four new classrooms were built. The rooms are carpeted, with large windows. The two large old classrooms were altered, given larger windows and modernised, and the small clasroom became our new library. One temporary classroom block was retained, to be used as a classroom and a music/needlework room. We now have three infant classes and four junior classes.
